name: .RPYB File Extension
summary: Learn about .RPYB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Ren'Py, a visual novel game engine often used to create interactive Japanese visual novels; saves a compiled script (.RPY file) and includes the bytecode that runs the novel; used alongside .RPYC compiled script files.

content: The RPYB file generated for visual novels is named bytecode.rpyb.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
